description.textDescription: High damage hits also create unstable black holes. Recharges over time. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.
description.advancedDescription: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center. Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% (+100% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 20 seconds. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.
